alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 8:33PM MDT until May 30 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Northwestern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 930 PM MDT/1030 PM CDT/. * At 833 PM MDT/933 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Philip to 5 miles northeast of Kadoka to 7 miles south of Belvidere, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midland, Belvidere and Nowlin. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 151 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
